api_list.api_description: Retrieve trace information from Cloudflare including IP Address, Timestamp, User Agent, Country Code, and more.

optional_parameters.name: endpoint
optional_parameters.description: The endpoint URL to query Cloudflare trace information.

api_list.api_description: Get information about a specific payload.

required_parameters.name: md5_hash
required_parameters.description: The MD5 hash of the payload.

query: I need to trace my current network setup and verify if a payload with a specific MD5 hash exists in the URLhaus database. Can you help with that?
